identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

mono.usage: Timers, Code Snippets, Data Metrics, Tags

spacing.philosophy: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

ui_patterns.surface_description: Expose the skeleton. Use border-r and border-b on grid items with low opacity (border-white/5).

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky Headers, Floating Action Buttons (FAB), Toasts

gradients.usage: Subtle glows only. No full backgrounds.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

navigation.mobile: Fixed bottom bar, glassmorphism effect, large icons (24px+).
navigation.desktop: Sidebar or Top bar with minimal height.

images.description: Abstract digital flow, dark theme, use with overlay for Hero section.
Minimalist dark workspace, use for Auth page side panel (desktop) or background (mobile).

instructions_to_main_agent.file_extensions: Use .jsx for components and pages. The project uses JS, not TS.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS for all styling. Avoid custom CSS files unless for complex animations.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use framer-motion for page transitions and micro-interactions. Add 'layout' prop to motion.div for smooth resizing.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts) for the Productivity Dashboard. Style them to match the 'Obsidian & Electric' palette.
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile_first: Always write mobile classes first (e.g., 'grid-cols-1') then md/lg overrides. Ensure touch targets are at least 44px.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links). Format: 'page-section-element' (e.g., 'login-form-submit').
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index).
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays are encouraged.
